data.eml:eml: The old-world Zygonini tr. nov. (Hemiptera, Cercopoidea, Clastopteridae), with new taxa from the related Machaerotinae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andrew Hamilton, K. G. (2014): The old-world Zygonini tr. nov. (Hemiptera, Cercopoidea, Clastopteridae), with new taxa from the related Machaerotinae. Zootaxa 3768 (4): 437-459, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.4.3
